form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE RECORDS, 04-RO570

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved igration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 043-RO570 ee Stamp APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE CONVENIENCE OF U.S. GOV'T RECORDS TYPE OR PRINT THE NAME AND MAILING ADDRESS OF THE PERSON TO WHOM INFORMATION OR COPIES OF RECORD SHOULD BE RETURNED IN THE BOX BELOW: PERSON CONSENTING NAME AND ADDRESS NAME SSA UNIT LAU KONG PING LUONG STREET ADDRESS 419 S. SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DO NOT COMPLETE THIS BLOCK - RESERVED FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY THE RECORDS OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE REFLECT THE FOLLOWING: DATE: 3/16/78 LAWFUL ADMISSION FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE ON AT NATURALIZATION INFORMATION AS SHOWN ABOVE IS CORRECT.
